channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The (artificial intelligence) therapist can see you now
item.description: Many AI products claim to deliver mental health therapy, but with little quality control. But new research suggests with the right training, AI can be...

item.title: The artist behind 'the worst' Trump portrait defends her work
item.description: The painting, which was commissioned by Republicans, has hung in Colorado's state Capitol since 2019. Trump follows other U.S. presidents who weren't ...

item.title: Netanyahu is set to meet Trump to talk tariffs and hostages in Gaza
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will meet with President Trump expecting to discuss tariffs, hostages and war in Gaza and other issues.

item.title: Colon cancer survivors who exercise regularly live longer
item.description: Colon cancer is on the rise in younger people in the U.S. New research shows regular exercise can help survivors live longer — in some cases even long...

item.title: Global markets plunge due to trade war. And, 2nd child dies in Texas from measles
item.description: Trump's trade war against most of the world has caused global markets to fall drastically. And, a second child in Texas has died from measles as the o...

item.title: 'Sometimes you have to take medicine': Trump defends sweeping tariffs
item.description: Just hours after Trump's comments, stock markets plunged in Asia early on Monday, with Hong Kong's Hang Seng losing 9.8%.

item.title: Why have Asian markets plunged?
item.description: Asian markets from Tokyo to Sydney plunged amid increasing fears of a global economic downturn.

item.title: US defends tariffs on remote island of penguins and seals
item.description: A group of islands, occupied only by penguins and seals, has been swept up in Trump's trade war.

item.title: Swollen rivers flood towns in US South after dayslong deluge of rain
item.description: Rivers rose and flooding worsened across the U.S. South and Midwest, threatening communities already waterlogged and badly damaged by days of heavy ra...

item.title: Overseas stock markets plunge, U.S. futures tumble as tariff turmoil continues
item.description: Overseas financial markets plummeted Monday and U.S. stock futures fell again in reaction to the Trump administration's latest tariff salvos.

item.title: 4/6/2025: The War in Gaza; The Prisoners; Wood to Whiskey

item.title: Australia PM candidate ditches plan to end work from home
item.description: Peter Dutton's Liberal-National coalition had said the move would improve efficiency in the public sector.

item.title: Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's NHL goals record
item.description: Alex Ovechkin made history when he scored against the New York Islanders on a power play in the second period.

item.title: "Doomsday mom" Lori Vallow Daybell's Arizona trial underway

item.title: Tariffs have shaken the markets - how worried should we be?
item.description: Workers are right to fear for their pensions, but the greater worry is the here and now - the economy they live in.

item.title: Judge says deportation of Maryland man to an El Salvador prison was ‘wholly lawless’
